price: Watadumu humo - ni ahadi ya Mwenyezi Mungu ya kweli. Na Yeye ndiye Mwenye nguvu, Mwenye hikima.
arabic: خَٰلِدِينَ فِيهَاۖ وَعۡدَ ٱللَّهِ حَقّٗاۚ وَهُوَ ٱلۡعَزِيزُ ٱلۡحَكِيمُ
footnotes: Watabaki humo daima dawamu; Mwenyezi Mungu amewaahidi ahadi isiyo vunjika. Na Mwenyezi Mungu ndiye Mshindi wa kila kitu, Mwenye hikima katika maneno yake na vitendo vyake.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: khālidīna fīhā waʿda al-lahi ḥaqqan wahuwa al-ʿazīzu al-ḥakīmu
